articles.description: Newcastle United winger Ryan Fraser has been in fine form but won't be involved in Scotland's friendly against Poland next week after withdrawing from the squad last November
articles.content:
Ryan Fraser has apologised to Scotland boss Steve Clarke after training with Newcastle United just days after withdrawing from international duty. 
Fraser had been called up by Clarke for the Tartan… [+1593 chars]

articles.title: Red-hot Arsenal are flying high on Mikel Arteta's happy vibe as they fight for a top four spot - Daily Mail
articles.description: MATT BARLOW: Mikel Arteta's response was emphatic when asked what he considered the biggest factor in Arsenal's progress this season.
articles.content:
Mikel Arteta's response was emphatic when asked what he considered the biggest factor in Arsenal's progress this season.
